thread.section_title: Grange Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value overnight stay
thread.title_full: Good value overnight stay - Review of Grange Wellington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LordPaulR
title: Good value overnight stay
text:
Lovely hotel. Very nice, clean, good sized bedrooms with clean and well maintained bathrooms.
Wifi is free.
I arrived late and check in by the night receptionist was very fast and professionally done. I didn't have breakfast or use the restaurants.
All in all a good value overnight stay in central London.
